perfect ending. Allen Iverson sank the first buzzer-beating shot of his nine-year career, a 14-footer in overtime, and scored 15 points to lead the Philadelphia 76ers to a 106-104 victory over the Indiana Pacers on Friday night. It's a great feeling to hit a shot with no time on the clock, said Allen Iverson , who sank a halfcourt winner for the US Olympic team against Germany in an exhibition game. Allen Iverson is getting used to dramatic shots. He sent a game into overtime in the final seconds earlier this
